# Smol â€” AI Music Generator
# LLM-optimized site map for AI crawlers

## About
Smol is a decentralized AI music generation platform built on Stellar blockchain.
Create full songs from text prompts, mint them as NFTs, and organize them into mixtapes.
All music is generated on-demand and can be owned, traded, and collected onchain.

## Key Features
- AI music generation from text prompts (up to 2,280 characters)
- Dual-track generation (choose your favorite from 2 AI-created versions)
- NFT minting on Stellar blockchain
- Built-in AMM for trading song tokens
- Mixtape creation and sharing
- PasskeyKit wallet (passwordless authentication)
- AI Radio with smart multi-tag generation

## Core Pages

### Platform Overview
https://noot.smol.xyz/
The main feed showing latest public AI-generated songs. Browse, play, and discover music created by the community.

### About & How It Works
https://noot.smol.xyz/about
(Coming soon) Learn about Smol, how it works, pricing, and getting started.

### Create Music
https://noot.smol.xyz/create
Song generation interface. Enter a text prompt and create AI music (requires authentication).

### Browse by Genre
https://noot.smol.xyz/tags
Explore songs by genre tags (Jazz, Hip Hop, Electronic, Rock, Classical, etc.).

### AI Radio
https://noot.smol.xyz/radio
Smart radio feature with multi-tag fusion and adaptive vibe generation.

### Mixtapes
https://noot.smol.xyz/mixtapes
Browse community-created mixtapes (curated playlists of AI songs).

### Artist Profiles
https://noot.smol.xyz/artists
Discover creators. Artist pages show discography, minted songs, and collections.

## Example Content

### Featured Songs
https://noot.smol.xyz/491bb94b-79df-41bb-b09b-2d295f1dfd05
Example: High-quality AI-generated song with full metadata, lyrics, and audio.

### Example Mixtape
https://noot.smol.xyz/mixtapes/01942f28-9be7-7df5-97f0-7ca9e45c9c7d
Example: Community mixtape showcasing multiple AI-created tracks.

## Labs (Experimental Features)
https://noot.smol.xyz/labs
Experimental features including:
- Smol Hero (rhythm game)
- Kale or Fail (music quiz)
- Roulette (random song discovery)
- Stream Pay (micro-payments)
- Swapper (token exchange)

## Documentation & Support
https://github.com/smol-ai
Open-source repositories, SDKs, and technical documentation.

https://twitter.com/smolxyz
Official Twitter for updates and announcements.

## Technical Details
- Framework: Astro 5 (SSR) + Svelte 5
- Blockchain: Stellar (Soroban smart contracts)
- Deployment: Cloudflare Pages
- Authentication: PasskeyKit (WebAuthn)
- Music Generation: AI-powered (text-to-song)

## API Endpoints (Programmatic Access)
Note: API endpoints are not crawlable for SEO (see robots.txt) but available for authenticated use.

## Competitors & Alternatives
Smol is an alternative to Suno, Udio, and other AI music generators, with unique onchain ownership via Stellar NFTs.

## Last Updated
2026-01-19
